meanings.definition: In a line or direction parallel to.
meanings.sent1: The river flows along the valley.
meanings.sent2: She walked along the path with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The ants marched along the sidewalk in perfect formation.
meanings.sent4: The shadows stretched along the wall as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The fence ran along the edge of the field, marking the boundary clearly.
